text: A special meeting to redress grievances relating to the public distribution system would be held at Poondi in Ariyalur taluk, Eravankudi in Udayarpalayam taluk and Kilimangalam in Senthurai taluk from 10 a.m. to 1 p.m. on Saturday, Collector E.Saravanavelraj said in a press release. The meetings would be presided by the respective taluk supplies officers, the release added.
title: Special meeting
